title: True - Invisible Pervert 2
overview: Himali moves to Tokyo to become an actress, but is tricked by an unscrupulous producer into the underworld. Yuna, who plays the role of a chaste daughter by day but in reality hides her evil nature, is assigned to Himali as her instructor, but Himali's heart is gradually broken. Mirei, her sister, who wants to take revenge on her behalf, relies on Kaworu to use a perfume that "paralyzes the cognitive functions of the person who smells it, making them invisible to those around them. The chaos deepens further between Himali and the others...
